results.content: I had used Drupal in the past for my own sites for different business ideas, and needed to re-learn it.  This course was an excellent practical overview of the most important constructs of Drupal.  It actually took me 3 days to go over the course, but did really enjoy it, the instructor was really clear, easy to follow, and explained the concepts very well.  Thank you.

response.content: Hi Umar-what examples are you looking for? If you look at the majority of the lessons, you'll find practical examples for building a Drupal site. In Lesson 4, you'll start to see more technical details.
response.content_html: Hi Umar-what examples are you looking for? If you look at the majority of the lessons, you'll find practical examples for building a Drupal site. In Lesson 4, you'll start to see more technical details.

results.content: This course provided a lot of step-by-step training with practical examples. The bonus material was beyond what I expected.
